name: WP Jobs
author: 99 Robots

sections.description:
Flexible options to list jobs on your site.

Allow people to apply and attach the Resume / CV.

Email notifications for new applications.

Newly Added Features

  • You can use Contact Form 7 or any other form plugin and place its shortcode for CV/Resume application and replace the default application form
  • Redesigned job listing and job detail pages
  • Added job type field (full time, contract, part time etc)d

Features

  • Add Jobs
  • Job Departments
  • Online job application
  • Resume / CV attachment
  • Email notifications
  • Job description, salary, location, department, job qualification requirements etc
  • Shortcode to list jobs anywhere. (All or by department)
  • Manage applicants
  • Translation ready
  • Contact form 7 compatible
  • Use any form plugin to accept job applications

Create Job Listing page

  • Create a regular page in your wordpress website
  • Then go to WP Jobs in admin > settings and select that page for job listing

Support

  • For support and feedback, please click here.
  • Youtube tutorial videos and channel
sections.installation:
1. Upload wpjobs to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. You should see a Properties tab on left panel
